UpdateLog.description: Small Bug FixesTiny - Graphic Overlays with patterns not rendering properly for blueprint placement. - Raiders still attacking vehicles with no pawns inside if turret was set to auto-target - Vehicles not deregistering from cover grid when rotating. - Vehicles could spawn out of bounds at certain angles when arriving with vanilla-chosen spawn position. - Mods using vanilla targeter such as 'Rimworld of Magic' and 'Eccentric Extras - Flares' would prevent vehicle targeters from starting. This included aerial launch targeting. - Vehicles entering maps would not take road areas into account. - Upgrades could be transfered to other vehicles by selecting another vehicle in the menu right before confirming the upgrade. - Vehicles spawning into a map would reset their target fuel level. - Pawns would not board a vehicle unless standing within distance to instant-board. Performance OptimizationTiny - Targeters don't run unless activated. - Vehicle regions will build in the background, significantly reducing impact to map generation times. Additional ChangesTiny - Vehicles can be temporarily disabled by EMPs. - Vehicles can be 'stashed' on the world map, allowing your colonists to continue on foot and retrieve your vehicles at a later time. Players - Vehicles consume 50% less fuel while idle - Added more entries to vehicle info cards including build costs, total health, turrets, etc. - Added 'teleport' DevMode button to vehicles when godmode is enabled, moving the vehicle instantly to a targeted location. Modders - Added affectedByEMP bool to vehicle properties. - FireMode shotsPerBurst and ticksBetweenBursts are now IntRange, allowing for varied burst counts and varied timing between bursts to make machine gun fire less robotic. Final NotesTiny Please report any issues you find on either https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ(discord) or https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicle-Framework/issues(github).
